titles.title: I Found A New Place In The Heavenlies

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I found a new place in the heavenlies,
In Jesus Christ, in Jesus Christ.
I found a new place in the heavenlies,
In Jesus Christ.
A place of peace, a place of rest,
A place of joy and happiness,
I found a new place in the heavenlies,
In Jesus Christ.
